Header.title: We are
Header.paragraph: The only classes in Chiplun that your child will ever need!

About.paragraph: SM classes started in June 2017 by Saquib and Muajja Dalvi with a vision to give quality education so that students can achieve their dreams.
About.paragraph2: Here we develop students learning and problem solving ability by teaching them from basic concepts so that they can score good not only in school exams but in various competitive/entrance exams also.
Why: We understand the students pain point
We work closely with the parents as well
We have been around for a long time now
We care for each and every student
Why2: We make learning fun and interesting
We follow path which works well for students
We are always open for constructive feedbacks

Services.name: Regular classes from standard 6th to 10th (State and CBSE board)
Diploma and Degree (Maths and Civil engineering subjects)

Testimonials.text: I have studied from std 8 till my HSC in SM classes. The marks which I scored are because of my mentor's guide, motivation, special attention. It was the best phase of the main part of educational life. i.e basic of education which I received from SM classes. It is an excellent coaching class for all the students. Mentor's keep attention on each and every students and they work on their both strength and weakness. The atmosphere in the class is just awesome. The weekly test boost the confidence of students in studies and also for their exams. The mentors have  most years of experience. Thank you for all the motivation and guidance...
Testimonials.name: Huma Dalwai

Testimonials.text: I studied 9th to 12th from SM classes, it has best mentors in chiplun also they pay attention to each and every student they work on students weakness and make the best out of them and motivate them . The exams are on times and there are weekly exams/ tests to see the improvement of the students and help them to achieve their goals. Hard working teacher and also have 12 + yrs  experience in teaching.
Testimonials.name: Ishan Dalvi

Team.name: Saquib Dalvi
Team.job2: 10 Years field and 7 years plus teaching experience

Contact.address: Areej Park, Shop no 6 (A-wing), Sakharwadi (Mirjoli) Chiplun-415605, Ratnagiri - Maharashtra

Features.title: Experienced Tutors
Features.text: We are a small yet strong team of experienced tutors.

Features.title: Clear Topic Explanations
Features.text: Explanation of all topics starting with basic concepts.

Features.title: Limited Students Batch
Features.text: To focus on the strength as well as weaknesses of each student we take limited students count per batch.
